article_title: Home Depot Pairs Fake Monkey With Black Men
article_text: Home Depot is apologizing for what some are calling a racist tweet sent out by the megastore. The tweet shows two African-American drummers and a third man in a monkey mask with the caption, "Which drummer is not like the others?"

article_metadata.sailthru.subheadline: The mega-hardware chain tweeted a photo of a man in a monkey mask and two black men playing drums and asked followers if they knew which one was not like the others.
article_metadata.sailthru.author: Stephen A. Crockett Jr.
article_metadata.description: The mega-hardware chain tweeted a photo of a man in a monkey mask and two black men playing drums and asked followers if they knew which one was not like the others.

article_summary:
The tweet shows two African-American drummers and a third man in a monkey mask with the caption, "Which drummer is not like the others?"
Home Depot is apologizing for what some are calling a racist tweet sent out by the megastore.
